Some of Brian Krebs' notable achievements include:

1.

Exposing the illegal activities of notorious cybercriminals: Krebs has been instrumental in uncovering the real identities behind several infamous cybercrime groups and individuals including the "ARTbushell" gang involved in massive phishing scams.

**Exposing illegal activities**: He has been instrumental in uncovering several major cybercrime operations including an infamous identity theft service called "Shadowcrew" which was shut down in 2004 with his assistance.

Exposing the ShadowCrew forum: In 2004, Krebs wrote about the ShadowCrew an underground forum where criminals would sell stolen identities and credit card information This exposure ultimately led to the shutdown of the forum.
Breaking the story on the massive Target Corporation data breach in 2013.
Exposing the inner workings of several major cybercriminal organizations including the ShadowCrew forum and the ZeuS botnet.
